```{r, read-config}
WHICH_CONFIG <- Sys.getenv("WHICH_CONFIG")
config_list <- config::get(
  config = WHICH_CONFIG
)
# WHICH_CONFIG <- "default"
```


```{r, set-chunk-opt,echo=FALSE,eval=config_list$production}
library(knitr)
#opts_chunk$set: set options for all the entire document (set the default)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE
  #if want to change default in specific chunk, can still do echo=TRUE
)
```


```{r, load-data}
here::i_am("report.Rmd")
data <- read.csv(here::here("data", "f75_interim.csv"), header = TRUE)
```
